title: 思科披露重大RCE漏洞（CVE-2025-20265，CVSS 10）：未认证攻击者可劫持防火墙
title_translated: Cisco disclosed a critical RCE vulnerability (CVE-2025-20265, CVSS 10): Unauthenticated attackers can hijack firewalls.
summary: Cisco's Secure Firewall Management Center (FMC) software has a critical remote code execution vulnerability due to insufficient input validation in the RADIUS subsystem. Unauthenticated attackers can exploit this flaw to execute arbitrary commands with high privileges on affected devices. Only specific versions with RADIUS authentication enabled are vulnerable.

title: CVE-2025-54336（CVSS评分9.8）：Plesk Obsidian关键漏洞使服务器面临完全被控风险
title_translated: CVE-2025-54336 (CVSS score 9.8): Critical vulnerability in Plesk Obsidian exposes servers to full control risk.
summary: A high-severity vulnerability in Plesk Obsidian allows attackers to bypass admin login verification due to a flawed authentication logic. By exploiting loose comparison in the password validation process, attackers can gain full control of the server using specific numeric strings. This affects Plesk Obsidian version 18.0.70.

title: WordPress 插件曝RCE高危漏洞（CVE-2025-7384，CVSS 9.8），逾 7 万网站面临数据泄露与破坏风险
title_translated: WordPress plugin has a critical RCE vulnerability (CVE-2025-7384, CVSS 9.8), posing a risk of data leakage and damage to over 70,000 websites.
summary: CVE-2025-7384 is a critical vulnerability affecting WordPress plugins like Contact Form 7, WPforms, and Elementor Forms, allowing attackers to exploit it without authentication. This can lead to denial of service or remote code execution, impacting over 70,000 active installations.

title: FortiSIEM CVE-2025-25256（CVSS 9.8）：远程未授权命令注入漏洞，野外已出现利用代码
title_translated: FortiSIEM CVE-2025-25256 (CVSS 9.8): Remote unauthorized command injection vulnerability, exploit code already in the wild.
summary: Fortinet has disclosed a critical remote command injection vulnerability in multiple versions of the FortiSIEM platform, allowing attackers to execute arbitrary commands without authentication. The flaw arises from improper handling of special characters, enabling remote exploitation through crafted CLI requests. Affected versions include 7.3.0-7.3.1, 7.2.0-7.2.5, and 7.1, with patches available in later releases.

title: NestJS DevTools 存在严重RCE漏洞（CVE-2025-54782）
title_translated: NestJS DevTools has a critical RCE vulnerability (CVE-2025-54782).
summary: A critical vulnerability in the @nestjs/devtools-integration package allows attackers to execute arbitrary code on a developer's local machine by tricking them into visiting a malicious website. The issue arises from improper sandbox isolation and the exposure of dangerous endpoints that accept and execute JSON input.
